price: Und ihr Gebet beim Haus ist nur Pfeifen und Klatschen. Kostet nun die Strafe dafür, daß ihr stets ungläubig wart.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءٗ وَتَصۡدِيَةٗۚ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna ṣalātuhum ʿinda al-bayti illā mukāan wataṣdiyatan fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
